content: Some really good points, especially about raising money in stages instead of millions up front. On a side note, in the spreadsheet linked in the pdf linked in the article, it says “Entitlement to a share of profits and/or losses, or assets and/or liabilities” means the token is almost certainly a security. Does that apply to situations where you get a share of fees (e.g. Augur) or ad revenue (e.g. Lunyr) for owning tokens?
